page.title: 16CHEDDAR VALLEY GAZETTE
page.content: The first page is relevant to the {Cheddar Valley.}The rest of the paper is almost the same as the{Wells {Journal}and{Shepton Mallet Gazette containing news from the towns.Twelve pages out of twenty are devoted to advertisements. These include car selling clothes e.g. wedding dresses and antiques. The paper also contains approximately two pages on property sales. You can also sell your own possessions and send greetings and messages. The paper contains things such as local news sports and weddings. Puzzles and games and t.v. programmes are also included in the paper. Last but by no means least there is a page for collectable antiques.
